page.title: 03Tourism and Holidays
page.content: Myself, my dad, my sister and my cousin all went to a small island in the Mediterranean called Minorca. We stopped in a villa for two weeks . I enjoyed it very much and I hope I can go there again.(Annette) We are going to Barmouth this year, our caravan site is owned by D.J.Williams and it has a part for people with tents to camp on. It has showers to put tokens in, you get the tokens from the shop as you drive in. They have toilets as well. Our Dad lives in Cornwall so we will visit him later on.(Louise) I have been to a few countries Spain, Majorca and Austria. I liked Spain best because I went with my cousins. When I go on holiday I like to spend most of my time in the pool but my parents like to get out and visit places.(Andrew)
